select
from `tbl_stu` stu LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic1 ON stu.`coll_id` = dic1.`val_id` AND dic1.`type` = 'col' LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic2 ON stu.`pro_id` = dic2.`val_id` and dic2.`type` = 'pro' AND dic2.`par_id` = dic1.`val_id` where stu.`stu_id` = #{id}

SELECT g.`class_id`,c.`name`,g.`grade`,d.`year_title` AS YEAR FROM `tbl_stu_grade` g LEFT JOIN `tbl_class` c ON g.`class_id` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN `tbl_year_dic` d ON c.`year` = d.`year_id` WHERE g.`stu_id` = #{id}
